ch0171_00_shijima/0101_0701_01_10:
Oooarrgh! I’ve been waiting for you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0171_00_shijima/0101_0701_02_10: Now that you’re here, let’s get straight to training!
ch0171_00_shijima/7101_0701_01_10: Training under a pounding waterfall is great!
ch0171_00_shijima/7101_0701_02_10:
The cold water can’t be beat, especially on hot
days!
ch0171_00_shijima/7101_0701_03_10:
If you like, I can teach you how to do waterfall
training sometime!
ch0171_00_shijima/7102_0701_01_10: Wahahah! Glad to see you looking energetic today!
ch0171_00_shijima/7102_0701_02_10: If you don’t have energy, you can’t train!
ch0171_00_shijima/7102_0701_03_10: And if you can’t train, you can’t get strong!
ch0171_00_shijima/7103_0701_01_10:
My Pokémon are a little— No, more than a little
different from ordinary!
ch0171_00_shijima/7103_0701_02_10:
They test their strength against each other to
train themselves!
ch0171_00_shijima/7103_0701_03_10: ’Cause they love training just as much as I do!
ch0171_00_shijima/7104_0701_01_10: Wahahah! What do you think of these muscles?!
ch0171_00_shijima/7104_0701_02_10:
After training them under a pounding waterfall
day after day, my muscles can crush boulders!
ch0171_00_shijima/7104_0701_03_10:
That really has nothing to do with Pokémon battles,
though! Wahahah!
ch0171_00_shijima/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You’ve got a lot of
potential!
ch0171_00_shijima/7105_0701_02_10:
If you keep training hard, you could even become
strong enough to crush boulders, just like me!
ch0171_00_shijima/7105_0701_03_10: ...What? That has nothing to do with Pokémon?
ch0171_00_shijima/7105_0701_04_10:
That’s true! But you can never go wrong by
getting stronger!
ch0171_00_shijima/7105_0701_05_10:
For example, uh... I know! You can open jars,
even if the lid’s stuck really tight!
ch0171_00_shijima/1701_0701_01_10: I’ve got a gift for you! Here, take it!
ch0171_00_shijima/1701_0702_01_10: Get out there and give it your all, youngster!
ch0171_00_shijima/2501_0701_01_10:
The sweets I eat between training sessions are
always the best.
ch0171_00_shijima/2501_0701_02_10:
It seems like the more I work out, the more my
body craves sugar!
ch0171_00_shijima/2501_0701_03_10:
The sweets are a reward to myself, but because
of them, this belly just won’t get any flatter, no
matter how much I train! Wahahah!
ch0171_00_shijima/2501_0702_01_10:
Hey! I bet you’re wondering about those post-
training sweets now too, aren’t you?
ch0171_00_shijima/2501_0702_02_10:
If you want to enjoy those sweets to the fullest,
why don’t you train along with me?!
ch0171_00_shijima/2511_0701_01_10:
Of course it’s important to work out and train
your body...
ch0171_00_shijima/2511_0701_02_10:
because putting in that effort every day helps to
boost your self-confidence!
ch0171_00_shijima/2511_0701_03_10:
And that’s the most important thing of all! There’s
no point in battling if you’ve already lost inside
your own head.
ch0171_00_shijima/2511_0702_01_10:
Anyway, the first thing you’ve got to do is believe
in yourself!
ch0171_00_shijima/2511_0702_02_10:
If you keep doing anything consistently, even if it’s
small, it’ll make you more confident! I promise!
ch0171_00_shijima/2511_0702_03_10:
The best thing to do is just keep doing whatever
you’re doing, and don’t stop halfway through!
Wahahah!
ch0171_00_shijima/3001_0701_01_10:
Yo! I work out hard from the crack of dawn! I love
to train under a waterfall and clear my head!
ch0171_00_shijima/3003_0701_01_10:
On Pasio, you can find the best sweets from
everywhere! I just loooove eating them with
my lunch!
ch0171_00_shijima/3005_0701_01_10:
At night, I think of my dear wife... I’m sure she’s
doing OK. She’s always been tough!
